title: Where are the female axe wielders at?
body: I was showing my friend some characters from league, and then they were like 'oh- axe wielders are cool', quick look at the champ roster and there a 0 female axe wielders, closest thing is probably riven. But Idk about you but I wouldn't mind seeing a female being too angry to die or swinging an axe at the speed of Aurelions E, I think it'd be a nice addiction to just have a fem character that YEETS an axe at the opponent

replies.body: Females wield divorce papers not axes.

> [{quoted}](name=IRight ArmI,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=49k883r1,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2020-01-18T07:05:54.352+0000)
>
> Females wield divorce papers not axes.

Give this man a cookie .

Eh, not entirely. Sion and Darius are very clear examples of how they can take different takes on the exact same style of combat. They could very easily make a female axe user who uses her axe like Olaf or Draven, but still operate in a completely new way.

Tell that to Smash bros sword wielders. 

Hell how many swords are there and Kassadin and Aatrox are huge differences. 
Oldv Aatrox doesn't even have his fighting style in the game anymore.

Primary target demographic for League probably wouldn't play as an axe using female, so chances are next to none. Yes they COULD make her look appropriate and fit in while using that style of weapon, but it is more work on their part and they prefer easy cash grabs (feminine weapons for females = easy sales).

That said, looking back on my 175 different concepts I've made(only 62 posted here), I do actually have one that would fit, notably [Jacqueline, The Inexorable](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/5jwsVPNl-jacqueline-the-inexorablechampion-concept) (I'd rather she look more mature, but the rest of the picture fit pretty nicely what I wanted; beggars can't be choosers).
And this why you just buy Fire Emblem Three Houses, go for the Edelgard route and then call it a day {{sticker:leblanc-funny}}
Aye I agree mate , female axe wielder's eh ? A man can dream

they should make a long axe wielding female that spin it around her waist to create an aoe effect like shyvanas fire, or infront of her to create a blocking spell, plus a carrying her axe horizontally and moving forward a bit like sion's ult but that deals damage only on the blade side and knocks ppl away on the other, and you can click to invert it or use the skill again to cancel it
There's no female Olaf for the same reason there's no male Lissandra: LoL doesn't have separate male and female versions of each trope/kit.
